main event: A civilian observed a round object with red and green lights swinging back and forth in Austin, Texas for over an hour.
interesting points: The object appeared stationary or hovered at about 3/4-1 degree above the horizon to the south., The lights on the object swang back and forth., Previous observations of the phenomenon noted rapid west to east movement., The object was still apparent at the time of the report., There were no other aircraft or balloon activities reported in the area during the observation.
sighted object: a round object with red and green lights
witness description: civilian, 49 years old, high school graduate, hydro electric mechanic
